name: Deathdealer's Spaulders
tooltip:
Deathdealer's SpauldersLevel 60

Bring the Qiraji Bindings of Command, 2 Idols of the Sun, 5 Silver Scarabs and 5 Clay Scarabs to Andorgos in Ahn'Qiraj.  You must also attain Neutral reputation with the Brood of Nozdormu to complete this quest.

Requirements:
- Qiraji Bindings of Command
- Idol of the Sun x 2
- Silver Scarab x 5
- Clay Scarab x 5
- Brood of Nozdormu:
